entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lethbridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -27.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lethbridge Airport 10:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -27.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -31.4°C
Wind: SSE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning then west 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
